description: Let m=n+1; a(n) is the least positive integer s, not a multiple of m, such that if 1<=d<=m and (d,m)=1, then d divides one of the numbers s-m, s-2m, ..., s-m[ s/m ].
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {m = n+1; s = m; while (1, sok = 1; if (s % m, for (d=1, m, if (gcd(d,m) == 1, ndok = 0; for (k=1, floor(s/m), if (((s-k*m) % d) == 0, ndok = 1; break;););); if (! ndok, sok = 0; break;);); if (sok, return(s)););s++;);}  \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 22 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
